metadata.name: Osacompile Execution By Potentially Suspicious Applet/Osascript
metadata.comment: Detects potential suspicious applet or osascript executing "osacompile".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/applet')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/osascript'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osacompile')))

output.summary: Detects potential suspicious applet or osascript executing "osacompile".
